p: Limonene in its isomeric forms was effective to reduce the number of strains of T. cruzi epimastigote where the R-limonene showed a lower EC 50 than S-limonene, showing greater efficiency ( 41). The caryophyllene obtained an EC 50 of 30 µg/mL and 100 µg/mL against epimastigote and promastigotes variations of T. cruzi and L. braziliensis respectively ( 42).
